author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٤٣) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الوُجُودِ ﴾
اذْكُرْنِي فِي أَرْضِي لأَذْكُرَكَ فِي سَمائِي؛ لِتَقَرَّ بِهِ عَيْنُكَ وَتَقَرَّ بِهِ عَيْنِي.
translation:
(43) O SON OF BEING!
Make mention of Me on My earth, that in My heaven I may remember thee, thus shall Mine eyes and thine be solaced.
